short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Every new tab is a different famous painting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the New Tab screen to a different famous painting every time it is refreshed. Only 42 paintings at the moment, but more will be added with future updates. High quality images, simple screen, no watermarks.
